entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the evening. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
